projectsData.title: E-commerce webshop
projectsData.description: Fullstack, fully functional and responsive E-commerce webshop. With user and admin dashboard for managing orders, stock, users,... It has a shopping cart with an integrated Paypal Api for making online payments. Users can search and filter products, add them to a cart and make purchases with online payment. Admins can edit and list new products, manage sales and users. If you wish to test the website as an admin login with these credentials: email: admin@admin.com, password: 123456. Paypal credentials: email: sb-fjfm16118256@personal.example.com, password: kUy$#2lb

technologies.name: ReactJS
technologies.description: Reusable components, context API, hooks and more

technologies.name: NextJS
technologies.description: Setting up the project, navigating between pages and data fetching,  dynamic routing, image optimization, SSG and SSR

technologies.name: MongoDB / Mongoose
technologies.description: Save and retrieve data like products, orders and users

technologies.name: Next Connect
technologies.description: Backend API

technologies.name: PayPal developer api
technologies.description: For online payment

technologies.name: Material UI
technologies.description: For building a responsive website using a custom theme, animation, carousel and more

technologies.name: Deployment
technologies.description: Hosted on Vercel with continuous deployment from Github

features.name: Registration & Authentication
features.description: Users can register to make a future purchases faster. Pages are protected so only authenticated users have access

features.name: Shopping Cart
features.description: Users can add products to cart, update or remove items and make an online payment with Paypal and credit card

features.name: User
features.description: Users can visit the Order History page to check past purchases. They can rate and review products. On profile page, they can change their username, email and password

features.name: Admin Dashboard
features.description: In the admin dashboard is possible to see details of past purchases, check and change the status of delivery and payment. Admins can add new products or update existing ones and they can also manage and delete users and create new admins

features.name: SEO
features.description: Dynamic meta tags based on dynamic pages and content

todos.name: Reset Password
todos.description: Need to implement the ability to reset forgotten password

todos.name: Email notifications
todos.description: Users will receive an email with specific information when they register, reset the password, make a purchase,...

todos.name: PDF Receipt
todos.description: When a purchase is made user will receive a PDF receipt. And in the dashboard, they can download receipt

projectsData.title: Music Events
projectsData.description: Fullstack events website. For backend is used Strapi CMS. Users can register and post events

technologies.name: ReactJS
technologies.description: Reusable components, hooks and more

technologies.name: NextJS
technologies.description: Setting up the project, navigating between pages and data fetching,  dynamic routing, image optimization, pagination

technologies.name: Strapi CMS
technologies.description: Open source headless CMS for admin to manage users and events

technologies.name: Security
technologies.description: JWT (JSON Web Tokens), storing HttpOnly Cookies on the server, authorization and access control

technologies.name: Cloudinary
technologies.description: Image uploading and optimization with Cloudinary integration

technologies.name: Deployment
technologies.description: Frontend hosted on Vercel and backend on Heroku with continuous deployment from Github

features.name: User Registration and Authorization
features.description: Users can register to post events. Pages are protected so only authenticated users have access to their own content

features.name: User
features.description: Users can visit the dashboard page to create, edit or delete their events

features.name: Map
features.description: Automatic map generation with marked location of the event that is visible on the website

features.name: SEO
features.description: Dynamic meta tags based on dynamic pages and content

todos.name: Comment and rate events
todos.description: Need to implement an ability to comment and rate events by users

todos.name: Reset Password
todos.description: Need to implement ability to reset forgotten password

todos.name: Email notifications
todos.description: Users will receive an email with specific information when they register, reset password

todos.name: Chat Room
todos.description: Where visitors can talk and comment about events

projectsData.title: Weather App
projectsData.description: Weather App that shows hourly and daily forecasts based on devices geolocation. The background is animated(gif) and changes based on weather condition

technologies.name: Openweather API
technologies.description: For fetching weather information with API calls

technologies.name: Javascript
technologies.description: For interactivity and DOM manipulation

technologies.name: Styling
technologies.description: For styling is used Bootstrap Material Design

technologies.name: Deployment
technologies.description: Hosted on Netlify with continuous deployment from Github

features.name: Weather Information
features.description: You can check the weather forecast for your device's current location. There is an hourly and daily forecast.

todos.name: Search
todos.description: Search bar for looking up other locations

todos.name: Local storage
todos.description: Save favourite locations to local storage
